org.jetel.component

Class XmlWriter.PortDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.component.XmlWriter.PortDefinition
  • Enclosing class:
    XmlWriter

    protected static class XmlWriter.PortDefinition
extends java.lang.Object
    Description of input port mapping and record's relations with records from another ports. Also wrapper for read data records.

      • fieldsAsExcept

        public java.lang.String[] fieldsAsExcept
